sentences.sContent: Among the people to whom Freud introduced cocaine was his colleague Carl Koller, a young doctor working in the department of ophthalmology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Among the people to whom Freud introduced cocaine was his colleague Carl Koller, a young doctor working in the department of ophthalmology.
sentences.sCn: 在这些弗洛伊德推荐给可卡因的人中，有一位是他的同事卡尔·科勒，他是个年轻的眼科医生。

sentences.sContent: Now 29, he practises clinical ophthalmology at the Me dic al College of Georgia, and volunteers in the third world, performing eye surgery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now 29, he practises clinical ophthalmology at the Me dic al College of Georgia, and volunteers in the third world, performing eye surgery.
sentences.sCn: 现在29岁的他正在乔治亚医学院做着眼科临床工作，同时他也是第三国家的志愿者，实行眼科手术。

trans.tranOther: the study of the eyes and diseases that affect them
